prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Brass, Guitar, Drums, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Brass, Guitar, Drums, Bass - no Piano in this song.

Style 2: This composition omits Piano, but features Reed, Brass, Guitar, Drums, and Bass.

Style 3: No Piano in this piece, but Reed, Brass, Guitar, Drums, and Bass are all present.
